rules.fullName: Convert Volume UOM Kilogram to Pound
rules.description: When CREATING or EDITING ProjectProduct__c records, automatically convert Volume entries from METRIC (Kilogram) to IMPERIAL (Pound).

rules.fullName: Convert Volume UOM Kilogram to Pound1
rules.description: When CREATING or EDITING ProjectProduct__c records, automatically convert Volume entries from METRIC (Kilogram) to IMPERIAL (Pound).

rules.fullName: Convert Volume UOM Ounce to Gram
rules.description: When CREATING or EDITING ProjectProduct__c records, automatically convert Volume entries from IMPERIAL (Ounce) to METRIC (Gram).

rules.fullName: Convert Volume UOM Ounce to Gram 1
rules.description: When CREATING or EDITING ProjectProduct__c records, automatically convert Volume entries from IMPERIAL (Ounce) to METRIC (Gram).

rules.fullName: Convert Volume UOM Pound to Kilogram
rules.description: When CREATING or EDITING ProjectProduct__c records, automatically convert Volume entries from IMPERIAL (Pound) to METRIC (Kilogram).

rules.fullName: Convert Volume UOM Pound to Kilogram1
rules.description: When CREATING or EDITING ProjectProduct__c records, automatically convert Volume entries from IMPERIAL (Pound) to METRIC (Kilogram).

rules.fullName: Convert Volume UOM from Gram to Ounce
rules.description: When CREATING or EDITING ProjectProduct__c records, automatically convert Volume entries from METRIC (Gram) to IMPERIAL (Ounce).

rules.fullName: Convert Volume UOM from Gram to Ounce1
rules.description: When CREATING or EDITING ProjectProduct__c records, automatically convert Volume entries from METRIC (Gram) to IMPERIAL (Ounce).
